price: Ils (Les diables) détournent certes [les hommes] du droit chemin, tandis que ceux-ci s’estiment être bien guidés.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahum layaṣuddūnahum ʿani al-sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muh'tadūna
